snippet: A long-promised package of government proposals, though narrowly drawn, angered Socialists while disappointing economists.
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande's government proposes long-promised program to stoke growth and create jobs; measures, pushed by centrist Economy Min Emmanuel Macron, fall far short of what some say is needed to revive stagnant French economy; some members of Hollande's own Socialist Party criticize proposals as too threatening to French way of life.
lead_paragraph: A long-promised package of government proposals, though narrowly drawn, angered Socialists while disappointing economists.

headline.main: France Is Forced to Face Political Facts in Effort to Stoke Economy
headline.print_headline: France Is Forced to Face Political Facts in Effort to Stoke Growth

keywords.value: SNCF (Societe Nationale des Chemins de fer Francais)
keywords.name: organizations
